location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Tracing of Rough Sketch Map Showing Approximate Area of Morrah Tribal “Dira” from Baduin Sources

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink on tracing clothDimensions:392 x 330 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures.Tracing of a map by Harold Richard Patrick Dickson, Lieutenant-Colonel, Political Agent to Kuwait. Shows the area occupied by the Al Murrah tribe and the approximate location of the other major tribes across the region with major towns and Bertram Thomas’ route across Al Khali (Empty Quarter) marked.
